https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/rshNjaBQyokbPqrR8GTvQuCfJsi.jpg Having suffered with psychosis for twenty years, Eddie is on advanced trials for a new drug called Ceresia. Near FDA approval, his progress breaks down as a new romance begins to invoke memories of his mother's fatal accident. Ceresia
